headline.main: Brazil Finds U-Boat Fuel Base; Japanese General Seized as a Spy; BRAZIL UNCOVERS U-BOAT FUEL BASE

lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, March 31 -- A report that Japanese along the Sao Paulo coast have been supplying fuel to German submarines was the outstanding sensation of a day in which police rounded up Axis nationals in raids in towns throughout that State.
abstract: U-boat fuel base reptd found along Sao Paulo coast
